Package com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.game

Class PlaceWallPacket

java.lang.Object
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.Packet
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.ServerPacket
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.SessionGameCheckPacket
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.game.PlaceWallPacket
public class PlaceWallPacket extends SessionGameCheckPacket
Uses given player to place a wall at the given position with the given direction. May return failure if player cannot place a wall at given position.
